idea:
JimSMEnews.com is an integrated news portal covering all latest updates on Indian SME sector. The portal aims to offer unbiased authentic information related to SME Business and financial events in India. JimSMEnews.com intends to set particular focus on companies listed in NSE/ BSE and also encompasses non-listed SME establishments/ organisations across India.

This news portal provides complete and updated details on equity market, business listing and company mergers, launching of new business units/ companies, Government aids to promote budding SMEs and awards and recognitions of Indian SMEs.

JimSMEnews.com is a comprehensive portal with a vision to offer global exposure to Indian SME sector. This news portal aspires to elevate every budding as well as listed business entity across India by offering a universal platform to announce their Business achievements.

JimSMEnews.com is owned by Jupiter Infomedia Ltd., a BSE listed web-infomedia with over a decade's experience in e-commerce.  -JimSMEnews
name: Umesh Modi

idea: We are into providing most affordable housing under PMYA in Mumbai Metropolitan region in Badlapur west. We are on the verge of giving possession of 107 dream homes - flats to our end user EWS-LIG Clients. We are planning to develop 1000 homes for EWS-LIG-MIG Users.
name: ASSETS REALITY

idea:
SUBAL was conceived with the single aim of improving the livelihoods in rural India by providing access to a range of products and services through a tech-enabled marketplace. We are a team of passionate entrepreneurs having varied experience right from running fertilizer business for the last 30 years to scaling some of the largest online commerce companies in India. 


As a first part of the service, we have been running a marketplace model to help farmers procure agri-inputs at the convenience of their doorstep. We ensure quality, price, availability, and logistics. Over the last two years, we have been able to build strong capabilities in field operations, call centers and technology enablement. We have so far worked with more than 80,000 farmers and have more than 50% repeat orders. 


We are looking for funding support to help scale operations pan-India. 


www.subalkisan.com
name: BECTRON TECHNOLOGY PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Biomix was incorporated in November, 1996 and registered in India and US (Delaware) having main manufacturing plant in India & research team worldwide.


Our manufacturing plant and R&D center (In addition to one in Navi Mumbai recognized by Dept. of Scientific & Industrial Research, Govt. of India) is located at the largest cooperative dairy in the world: AMUL, providing a continuous source of high quality raw materials for our patented brand products, Receptol & Biomix liquid, a path breaking Broad Spectrum Antiviral, New Generation Immuno-modulator and Antioxidant for Chronic debilitating conditions like HIV, Cancer, TB, Arthritis, Allergies & other Viral, bacterial / respiratory recurrent infections including common cold, Asthma, Diarrhea, Nausea and Disturbed Sleep via building body's own immune system under the. Our manufacturing plant is certified for ISO 22000 & GMP by TUV Nord.


Biomix is empowering millions of farmers & their families by procuring dairy waste to manufacturing life saving Receptol to prevent all communicable diseases including Swine flue, HIV/AIDS, Cancer, TB, Common cold etc in children across the schools in India. During the Swine Flue Pandemic, Receptol was distributed on domestic & International air ports.


Biomix is manufacturing Receptol using state of the art Nano Biotechnology process. After removing fat & cheese, the colostrum whey is passed through a series of nano & Ultrafiltration processes to get the desired product. Biomix have a holistic approach towards providing complete health via treatment to prevention using Receptol or by products in children in India and all over world.
name: Pawan Saharan

Our activities are structured around the philosophy that children learn through play.
name: Priyank Dahanukar

idea:
ABOUT

Tsunami Corp is a Mumbai-headquartered, startup tech-driven content company, building products & experiences targeted at the Insta-Generation. It draws its inspiration from the Japanese alliteration of the words Tsu, which means harbor and Nami that means gigantic Tsu-Nami stands for the harbor for all things big.


VISION

As an organization, our vision is to visualize, nurture & grow ideas and stories that can inspire a generation. Tsunami sees itself as a master blend of award-winning creative talent, proprietary technology, processes, and innovative strategy.


WHY TSUNAMI

Tsunami saw a need gap in the market esp. in content creation and communication wherein brands and advertisers were transforming and moving from pure advertising to storytelling.


With a strong background in content creation, Tsunami Corp focused on this need gap & grabbed this opportunity. Storytellers at heart & tech junkies to the core, Tsunami strives to create experiences for & of a contemporary, emerging India for the Insta-generation.


THE TSUNAMI PROPOSITION

Tsunami embeds and integrate with brand creative operations anywhere in the world and execute mission-critical motion graphics and promotions in addition to meeting daily brand creative requirements.


Tsunami operates within the two-minute barrier. We are focused on creating and developing our craft within this niche. We fulfill a business need that exists in the market today


Our biggest differentiator is that we are very process-driven, which therefore allows us to provide scale solutions.


THE TSUNAMI EFFECT

Here is a small sample on the work that we are doing for MIA By Tanishq.

MIA today is Me In Action, a brand movement that captures, documents and brings out the story of the ordinary extraordinary woman, who is charting her own path on her own terms.


The brand has seen recall & resonance jump up dramatically ever since the series went LIVE. Do catch some of the films here

https://youtu.be/0-22p9Mtv7Q - Elizabeth (Shooter)

https://youtu.be/t2QFArCBY5s - Namrata (Social Foodpreneur)

https://youtu.be/jzimNnpQAq0 - Bhumi & Simran (Photographers)


USP OF TSUNAMI

1. Superior Tech (that eases production, saves time and provides perfection), allowing one to create at SCALE.

2. Vast Distribution Network ( Celebs, Creators, Partner Platforms).

3. Process Driven ( Better project management & timeline focus)

4. Experience ( Of having built large digital & Tv platforms)

5. Cost Efficiencies

All of this combined allows us to deliver projects faster, at scale and quality like none other.
name: TSUNAMI VENTURE CORPORATION PRIVATE LIMITED

name: Gurukrishnan Perumal

idea:
With a population of 1.37 billion, India generates 9.46 MN tons of plastic wastes annually. Around 40% of this remains uncollected making India the 15th biggest plastic polluters globally, study by Un-Plastic Collective, a voluntary initiative launched by UN Environment Programme, CII and WWF India. Another 43 per cent out of that is used for packaging, most of which are single-use, a new study has revealed. Urban India, comprising of about 377 million people, generates 62 million tons of municipal solid waste each year; 70% of this is collected. Only 20% of this is treated, while 50% is dumped into landfill sites. 

With changing consumption patterns and rapid economic growth, it is estimated that urban municipal solid waste generation will increase to 165 million tons in 2030.

Belgium is a pioneer in waste and recycling management. By investing in India, through its 100% subsidiary Gemcorp Recycling & Technologies Pvt. Ltd., Gemini Corporation N.V., Belgium, aims to install 650 machines by 2024 to collect and bail approx. 165,000 tonnes (364 million pounds) of plastic waste annually apart from regular trading, which is targeted at 82,500 tonnes (182 million pounds) annually, totalling to the recycling of 247,500 tonnes (546 million pounds). Gemini is also planning to install a grinding unit which will further ease the requirement of recyclers and increase the capacity of aggregators. It also aims to install a recycling unit which will increase the capacity in India to recycle more and more plastic wastes.

Gemcorp is introducing one advanced mobile technological application which will bridge the gap between the waste generators and aggregators.
name: GEMCORP RECYCLING & TECHNOLOGIES PRIVATELIMITED
